revised_title: On the Colouring Matters Produced from Aniline: Rosaniline and its Salts
tldr: The author investigates the colorant properties of aniline and its derivatives, specifically focusing on rosaniline, a powerful base that forms various salts with unique crystallization properties. Rosaniline is identified as the prototype of a group of similar compounds obtainable from aniline's homologues and analogues.
